KH Duel Gear
1 1 Artifact - Equipment Artifact
1 Duel Gear is a Keyblade when equipped to a Keyblade-Wielder. Equipped creature has first strike. (That creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Equip {1}
KH Phantom Gear
1 1 Artifact - Equipment Artifact
